content.question: A major goal of the 1991 Maastricht Treaty was to

choices.label: adopt a single language and curriculum for all European Union schools
negotiate trade accords between the European Union and the North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
unify all of the European Union national armies into a single force
create a single currency and central bank for the European Union
empower the International Court of Justice as the Supreme Court of Europe

content.answer: create a single currency and central bank for the European Union

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
